# levelIndicatorStyle

**Instance Property**

The style of the level indicator control.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var levelIndicatorStyle: NSLevelIndicator.Style { get set }
```

## Discussion

The style determines the default minimum and maximum values of the control. For a list of possible styles, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSLevelIndicator/Style].

## Configuring the Range of Values

- **minValue**: The minimum value of the control.
- **maxValue**: The maximum value of the control.
- **warningValue**: The warning value of the level indicator control.
- **criticalValue**: The critical value of the level indicator control.
